titleStmt.title: Reflections on the poems made upon the siege and taking of Namur together with a short answer to the modest examination of the Oxford decree, &c. Lately published. Both in a letter to a friend at Oxon.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and are to be sold by M. Whitlock, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: In part a reply to: Sherlock, William. A modest examination of the authority and reasons of the late decree of the vice-chancellor of Oxford, and some heads of colleges and halls.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
